mapper.update: UPDATE instruct SET `STATUS`=20, REPLYTIME=sysdate(), RESULT=#{result} WHERE ID=#{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO track (NUMBER, GPSTIME, SERVERTIME, LNG, LAT, ALT, SPEED, ANGLE, ALARMS, `STATUS`, MILEAGE, OILMASS, VSS, OVAREATYPE, OVAREAID, IOAREATYPE, IOAREAID, IOAREAFLAG, ROUTEID, ROUTESECONDS, ROUTEFLAG, ALARMID, EXSTATUS, IOSTATUS, AD0, AD1, NETWORK, SATELLITES) VALUES
(#{item.dn}, #{item.gt}, SYSDATE(), #{item.lng}, #{item.lat}, #{item.alt}, #{item.sp}, #{item.d}, #{item.a}, #{item.s}, #{item.m}, #{item.oil}, #{item.vss}, #{item.ovt}, #{item.oid}, #{item.iot}, #{item.iid}, #{item.iof}, #{item.rid}, #{item.rt}, #{item.rf}, #{item.aid}, #{item.exs}, #{item.ios}, #{item.ad0}, #{item.ad1}, #{item.net}, #{item.sat})

INSERT INTO fault (NUMBER, GPSTIME, SYSID, MODEID, CODE1, CODE2, CODE3) VALUES
(#{item.number}, #{item.time}, #{item.sysId}, #{item.modeId}, #{item.code1}, #{item.code2}, #{item.code3})

INSERT INTO flow (NUMBER, GPSTIME, VSS, MILEAGE, BV, RPM, ECT, RUNTM, EOT, IFC, OT, IAT, ET, MAF, AP, LOADPCT, MAP, LFTP, ALTP, RRTP, RFTP, MORD, IAA, LONGFTB1, SHRTFTB1, SHRTFTB1S1, SHRTFTB1S2, FAULTS, TP, TPALB, TPALC, FRP, FUELSYS1, FUELSYS2, O2SB1S1, O2SB1S2, PPSD, PPSE, VAPTB1S1, VAPTB1S2) VALUES
(#{item.number}, #{item.time}, #{item.vss}, #{item.mil}, #{item.bv}, #{item.rpm}, #{item.ect}, #{item.runtm}, #{item.eot}, #{item.ifc}, #{item.ot}, #{item.iat}, #{item.et}, #{item.maf}, #{item.ap}, #{item.loadpct}, #{item.map}, #{item.lftp}, #{item.altp}, #{item.rrtp}, #{item.rftp}, #{item.mord}, #{item.iaa}, #{item.longftb1}, #{item.shrtftb1}, #{item.shrtftb1s1}, #{item.shrtftb1s2}, #{item.faults}, #{item.tp}, #{item.tpalb}, #{item.tpalc}, #{item.frp}, #{item.fuelsys1}, #{item.fuelsys2}, #{item.o2sb1s1}, #{item.o2sb1s2}, #{item.ppsd}, #{item.ppse}, #{item.vaptb1s1}, #{item.vaptb1s2})

INSERT INTO datalog (NUMBER, TIME, RAW) VALUES
(#{item.number}, #{item.time}, #{item.raw})

INSERT INTO trip (NUMBER, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, MILEAGE, MAXSPEED, AVGSPEED, OVERSPEED, OVERSPEEDTIME, BREAKS, SPEEDUP, MAXECT, MAXRPM, AVGBV, TOTALOIL, AVGOIL, FATIGUETIME, IDLETIME) VALUES
(#{item.number}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.mileage}, #{item.maxSpeed}, #{item.avgSpeed}, #{item.overSpeed}, #{item.overSpeedTime}, #{item.breaks}, #{item.speedUp}, #{item.maxEct}, #{item.maxRpm}, #{item.avgBv}, #{item.totalOil}, #{item.avgOil}, #{item.fatigueTime}, #{item.idleTime})

INSERT INTO multimedia(ID, NUMBER, TIME, MEDIAID, MEDIATYPE, FORMATTYPE, EVENTTYPE, CHANNELID, LNG, LAT, SPEED, ANGLE, ALARMS, `STATUS`, CONTENT) VALUES (#{id}, #{number}, #{time}, #{mediaId}, #{mediaType}, #{formatType}, #{eventType}, #{channelId}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{speed}, #{angle}, #{alarms}, #{status}, #{data})
INSERT INTO onoffline(NUMBER, TIME, ISON, ONTIME, OFFTIME) VALUES (#{number}, #{time}, #{on}, #{onTime}, #{offTime})
